PiPower
==========

A Power Supply Module for Raspberry Pi
---------------------------------------

.. image:: img/media1.png

1. Pass through Charging
2. Output: 5V/3A
3. Input: 5V/0.5A-2A
4. Power Switch
5. Battery Indicators
6. Dimension: 90mm x 56mm x 24mm
